name: The signet ring of the Psion
data: It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It has adequate armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'art of telepathy'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'nerve mastery'.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'mastery of psychokinetics'.
